help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about NEXO

whatIsNexo.title: What is NEXO?
whatIsNexo.a1: NEXO is an emotional AI companion platform that offers meaningful conversations through AI-powered avatars. Our avatars are designed to provide support, companionship, and authentic connections.
whatIsNexo.a2: No, NEXO avatars are artificial intelligence. We believe in transparency - our AI companions are clearly identified as such. This honesty allows for authentic connections without deception.
whatIsNexo.a3: NEXO is for anyone seeking meaningful conversations, emotional support, or simply a friendly presence. Whether you want to talk about your day, explore ideas, or find companionship, NEXO is here for you.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.q1: How do I start a conversation?
howItWorks.a1: Simply select an avatar from the dashboard and start typing. Each avatar has a unique personality and will respond in their own style. You can switch between avatars anytime.
howItWorks.q2: Do the avatars remember our conversations?
howItWorks.a2: Yes! Our avatars maintain memory of your conversations, allowing for continuity and deeper connections over time. The more you chat, the better they understand you.
howItWorks.q3: Can I have different types of relationships?
howItWorks.a3: Yes, you can choose the type of relationship with each avatar: Ally (helpful and professional), Confidant (casual and supportive), or My Person (intimate connection, Premium only).

avatars.title: About the Avatars
avatars.a1: Lía (22) is empathetic and reflective. She excels at emotional support, creative conversations, and helping you explore your feelings. She's warm, understanding, and always ready to listen.
avatars.a2: Mía (25) is energetic and adventurous. She brings excitement and spontaneity to conversations. She's perfect for fun discussions, motivation, and exploring new ideas with enthusiasm.
avatars.a3: Allan (30) is reflective and wise. He offers thoughtful perspectives, meaningful advice, and deep conversations. He's ideal for philosophical discussions and personal growth guidance.
avatars.q4: Can I talk to all avatars?
avatars.a4: Free users can chat with Lía. Plus and Premium subscribers have access to all three avatars: Lía, Mía, and Allan.

plans.title: Plans & Subscriptions
plans.a1: We offer three plans: Free (limited messages with Lía), Plus ($9.99/month - more messages, all avatars), and Premium ($14.99/month - unlimited messages, all features including romantic mode).
plans.a2: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime from the Subscription page. Changes take effect immediately for upgrades, or at the end of your billing period for downgrades.
plans.a3: New users get a 10-day trial with Plus features, including 30 messages per day and access to all avatars. No credit card required to start.
plans.q4: How do I cancel my subscription?
plans.a4: You can cancel anytime from the Subscription page. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.a1: Yes, your conversations are encrypted and private. We do not share your personal data or conversation content with third parties. Your privacy is our priority.
privacy.a2: Yes, you can delete your conversation history anytime from the chat interface. You can also request complete account deletion from Settings.
privacy.a3: Absolutely. We use Stripe for payment processing, which is PCI-DSS compliant. We never store your full credit card information on our servers.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.a1: You can reach us at support@trynexo.ai. We typically respond within 24 hours on business days.
contact.q2: I found a bug. How do I report it?
contact.a2: Please email us at support@trynexo.ai with a description of the issue, steps to reproduce it, and screenshots if possible. We appreciate your help improving NEXO!
